website_summaries.verdict: Get the Kyocera DuraForce if a rugged handset is a priority; otherwise, AT&T has other handsets in the same price range with better cameras and faster internal speeds.
pros: AT&T's Kyocera DuraForce features a tough and waterproof construction, push-to-talk capabilities, impressive call and audio quality, and a competitive price tag
cons: The handset comes with a lot of bloatware you can't get rid of, its camera takes poor photos, its processor is sluggish at times and its battery drains quickly

customer_reviews.title: IRAQ VET APPROVED
customer_reviews.text: Easy too set up using straight talk AT&T sim card however this phone takes a "Nano" sim card. I have ran water over it and the phone sill works I have done a normal drop test on concrete and no external damage phone is operational,this phone comes with some AT&T apps that will only work if you have actual AT&T also this phone came very quickly I advise getting the phone case and screen protector all at once .
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: I am glad it gave me issues before I run out of ...
customer_reviews.text: I am glad it gave me issues before I run out of return time. I could make calls but I could not receive calls. When the phone came, there was a sim card inside. That made me to think that it was refurbished and they forgot to take the sim card out. I had to return it. I am with At&t, they could not help me. Otherwise, the phone is very durable. It looks like great phone. But I see mixed reviews here too. I wish they would fix the issues, we liked the phone device.
customer_reviews.author: zaritsa

customer_reviews.title: but after that its been perfect. I've already dropped it like 50 times in ...
customer_reviews.text: had to go in and adjust all the weird code numbers to make it work on TMobile, out of the box it would disconnect constantly because its an AT&T phone, but after that its been perfect. I've already dropped it like 50 times in the first 2 weeks, and used it in the rain and in the shower. functions great, runs smooth. i was afraid it was going to have a really crappy interface and lag a lot. i dont play games on it or anything really, but FB, reddit, and a star gazing app all run smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M.

customer_reviews.title: Good for price, but too much AT&T bloat
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself is OK, for the price you pay. Camera is no good, but if you are using this for call/messaging/internet with a sim card, it does it job. My main purpose was to get a phone so that I could use it with an international SIM for emergency/low usage purposes while traveling outside the States. This phone did its job! My low star rating is because I could not use Tethering... and I did not get that it had all the AT&T junk installed. I am assuming that AT&T junk prevents the Tethering/Hot spot functionality. Anyhow, I am probably going to install LineageOS to see if I can get rid of the bloat.
customer_reviews.author: Abhinav Chandola

customer_reviews.title: I usually breaks my phone every couple of months. ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually breaks my phone every couple of months... But not this one... It fell in the water, on the floor and...nothing! Definitely a phone for me
customer_reviews.author: Capestan family

customer_reviews.title: great phone, all day battery
customer_reviews.text: great phone, all day battery, great GPS (my main use), OK camera, loud speaker, and Android Pay works flawlessly with it IF you don't root the device. to use the GPS WITHOUT the cellular antenna, open the dialer application and type *#*#4636#*#* which will open the "testing" section, and you can turn off the cellular antenna without effecting the GPS. if you use "airplane mode" it disables all the antennas, including GPS.... use the above instruction to get LONG BATTERY LIFE while GPS use :-)
customer_reviews.author: christie peterson

customer_reviews.title: Kyocera DuraForce-ful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this phone with relatively modest expectations..the processor is acceptable, build quality appeared to be tough but moderate, looks weren't especially Hollywood..however- exceeded my expectations in all ways so far. Faster than my Huawei, tough and ruggedly handsome, runs all my commonly-used Android apps, and - most important- very good signal strength and old-person-acceptable volume and tone. Accepts up to 64gb SD Micro cards and T-Mobile nano SIM; caution- MUST add the T-Mobile APN to enable successful LTE on their Network! Highly recommended if you don't require pretty and don't mind solidly substantial non-Apple or Samsung..
customer_reviews.author: cyberhog

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for what it is.  GSM world phone, older gen, cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone very cheap and used it for traveling Europe. It's last gen tech, and comes with a bunch of AT&T craplets(apps) such as some phone book sync feature that always reminds it's connecting to a backup server it will never access when not on the AT&T network. But basic functionality of smartphone, use of maps, directions, voice search, etc is great. Many of the integrated cloud features of current gen phones you'll be frustrated with(I replaced with Galaxy A3). But for the money this is a terrific phone, and Kyocera's commitment to good corporate ethics has always impressed me.
customer_reviews.author: og

customer_reviews.title: Diceptive Advertising
customer_reviews.text: Product was advertised as unlocked. Product delivered appeared to be in good shape and functional but was locked to AT&T. Corporate Buybacks has so far ignored my complaint. Have not been able to get an unlock code despite attempting to use several different services that promised to be able to get the unlock code for the phone. At this point I'm beginning to think that they are little more than scams with pretty webpages. Overall fairly negative experience.
customer_reviews.author: errrgh

customer_reviews.title: This phone is tough and waterproof, but has significant ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is tough and waterproof, but has significant software and volume issues. Less than 5months and it has a glitch where it powers down randomly. If I can return it/redeem warranty, I will. No response nor any assistance from seller or even correcting incorrect warranty information on product page. I wouldn't buy, even though I like the phone design and ruggedness; I'll need to replace much too soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too much AT&T bloatware.
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself seems good, although it takes FOR - EH - VER to turn on. My only problem is with the installed software. I bought this as a phone for my 8 year old son. It comes loaded with ATT specific software including the infamous ATT Address Book. The address book locks up the contacts page and it takes some futzing. I finally figured out remove it (it is called AAB in the Apps). ATT Drive Mode is another intrusive piece of bloatware.
customer_reviews.author: W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal for $68!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal! Sold by: Amazing1980 for $68. The device is new (at least it looks like new) and unlocked. It works perfect right out of the box. I had no problem with connection in Europe as well. Battery is really good for me (I'm not a chater): 4 days without wifi. The device is robust, but I've decided to apply protective screen anyway. But I discover that it is hard to find a proper screen protector: most of them are not fit correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Viacheslav Kulik

customer_reviews.title: 2 failed attempts
customer_reviews.text: tried twice to get this phone. 1st time was sent a LOCKED AT&T phone. 2nd attempt it was unlocked, great! BUT, it could not stay connected to any network, even wifi for more than a min at a time without disconnecting and reconnecting. Also, battery was at 60% and then flat died. Gave up, avoid
customer_reviews.author: Se7en

customer_reviews.title: Overheats and dies
customer_reviews.text: This phone is nice while it lasts, and maybe you'll get a good one. I got this phone for a friend and it promptly overheated and shut down. I googled and found many others who have the same problem, with no fix in sight. To clarify, this phone overheats and turns off when doing normal things like watching a youtube video. We weren't playing a first-person-shooter here. If the phone had not overheated it would have been a good buy for the price. Rugged construction, stock Android interface, everything works pretty well... right up until it suddenly shuts off.
customer_reviews.author: C. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good and sturdy phone at a great price. I had to purchase another one after about 2 or so years because the battery wasn't holding its full charge anymore. I do tell you that you CANNOT replace the battery in this phone! So you will need to purchase a new phone if the battery is going bad. Overall this is a great phone at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kirsten Egbert

customer_reviews.title: too bad
customer_reviews.text: I like the Phone but was unable to get it to work consistantly with the T Mobile sim. I tried updating the settings as posted by others and I was only able to make outgoing calls sometimes and no incoming calls at all. It was a bummer because I really liked it. The screen is a bit too small but otherwise a really good semi fast phone that you can beat up. I ended up sending it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Tzimis

customer_reviews.title: Not an unlocked phone.  AT&T only
customer_reviews.text: It’s not an unlocked phone it’s an in the box at&t phone with an at&t SIM card. You can’t enter a new APN to use a t mobile sim. I’m waiting to see if at&t will send an unlock code. In the meantime this is a broken useless product.
customer_reviews.author: Brent H

customer_reviews.title: As of now it appears to be a great sturdy phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my son that is graduating Basic Training on 6/29. As of now it appears to be a great sturdy phone. I am hoping that it is truly unlocked and will accept Straight Talk. If this phone does not perform as expected I will update the review.
customer_reviews.author: TDCook

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Everything it claims to be
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Everything it claims to be. Haven't got it wet yet, but dropped it many times with no problems. Highly recommend getting the case and clip for it. Clip comes in handy especially when you don't have pockets and need both hands
customer_reviews.author: David Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Good phone but not water proof. It got water inside of it when I rinsed it off in the kitchen sink. The covers on the charging port leak. Now my buttons at the bottom of the phone do not work properly. Since I purchased the phone because I need a waterproof phone I cannot give it a good rating.
customer_reviews.author: DodgeSwinger73

customer_reviews.title: Wicked phone
customer_reviews.text: I live Trinidad and Tobago and I bought one of this for my brother in law and so.far he love him. Only thing it's not dura sim so that was a bummer, but he said the phone is sick. Waterproof and everything. There is a package with phone tempered glass and case. I advice buy it. You would come out better in the long wrong. Right now am ordering two more for my sis and her husband.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This phone seemed like it kept searching for a connection
customer_reviews.text: This phone seemed like it kept searching for a connection. As I would look at it the "caution" triangle would come up then the T-mobile symbol. Just kept switching back and forth. Sometimes the phone would not ring at all when certain people called. This is getting returned.
customer_reviews.author: Patti J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Kyocera DuraForce UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Kyocera cell phone without awareness to SIM card & Micro SD card . Without Kyocera lacking to shipping error for lack of cards, phone never worked. PLEASE me ASSIST A PURCHASE OF SIM card / Micro SD cards. Provide information for card size and availability. Finally; I personally suffered through 2 strokes since 2017, my physical abilities are limited and my speech is confusing for others. I will appreciate anything I receive. Albert Perry
customer_reviews.author: know nothing

customer_reviews.title: Loved the phone
customer_reviews.text: Loved the phone, but the phone we received could only pick up half of the reception that another household phone received, so phone was returned for a refund. Too bad too, because I really liked the phone shape, size and operating system.
customer_reviews.author: CCDAMEEK

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Fell out of my truck screen shattered not even 3 feet was really disappointed not to mention it wasn't actually unlocked I had to pay to get it flashed to use with Metro
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: seems like a good cheap phone if your work gets you dirty
customer_reviews.text: front facing camera stopped working after a week will work if hit just right. might just be the particular unit i got but thats why im only giving it 3 seems durable not as good as the durascout i had but good enough to keep in my pocket at work. its gotten wet gotten concrete dust on it saw dust etc can text while hands are wet and dirty
customer_reviews.author: Coleman Y. Bray

customer_reviews.title: Tough little bugger
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little phone, very rugged and dependable. I moved to rural acreage and needed something I didn't have to baby when working in field and such, this has worked brilliantly. For those looking for a durable basic smart phone for a darn good price this is it. I use ATT which is imprinted on phone so I think it is that network only.
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Not as accessability enabled as i was led to believe
customer_reviews.text: This phone does not support Google assistant. It also does not have many features for accessability. I pyrchased due to the large amount of buttons (purchased for blind person) the buttons unfortunately are not easily modified to fit. Google assistant is not supported and talk back is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Alex and Kelsi Brosnahan

customer_reviews.title: Blue tooth is weak, don't bother trying to take ...
customer_reviews.text: Blue tooth is weak, don't bother trying to take a picture from the front camera unless in direct sunlight, Speaker phone broke 2 months in, and it drops my calls and half the time doesnt let me pick up. But on the other hand i have dropped it plenty of times and still kicking. Very durable, just a cheap phone internally.
customer_reviews.author: cindee

customer_reviews.title: military grade and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: works well.flashlight feature is awesome.other features are practical and work well.very sturdy and good quality.dropped by accident accouple times on kitchen tile floor. Very Durable,still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E Hoagland

customer_reviews.title: Phone is not working correctly!
customer_reviews.text: Upon setting up the phone, I selected the language English, however, some menus are appearing in Spanish and some are in English. Also there are certain features of the phone that are not working correctly, such as Text Messaging. I can send MMS text messages, however, when i receive a MMS text I a see a download option that never works. I have gone through all settings and cannot seem to find the issue. My next step is to back up all content and perform a hard reset. Very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shoes

customer_reviews.title: I bought the phone for work because I clean swimming ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the phone for work because I clean swimming pools and the duraforce is water proof. I have dropped my phone in the pool and as I netted my phone out of the pool my friend was still talking. The speaker does take time to dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Rugged
customer_reviews.text: Second E6560 I have purchased. Good phone for a great price. I purchased it as I enjoy being on water kayaking, I do not bother keeping it away from water or being splashed. Water proof is questionable, I did take my first under water several times and took videos, it held up for a while, eventually minor leakage began. I have seen it bounce off of pavement and not crack lense, but, purchased second as lense eventually cracked on first. I would recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: NO wireless chargers
customer_reviews.text: E6560 was advertised to use wireless charging; Owner's manual said it could also;but nowhere does it say what kind of charger [it uses a PMA format not: Qi or Samsung} is needed. Kyocera website is set-up for sales and not helpful to new owners.After long searching I found a manufacters unit on site, at $100 , triple the cost of aftermarket competitors, not that it mattered ; its long out of stock and no one seems to know when it will be in or if it will ever be avalible !!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe K

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Abuse-able, and perfect for Kid lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 yr olds first phone. He drops it constantly, and his younger brother once threw it against the wall (a bit jealous). It works perfectly and still looks new months later. I highly recommend this product and I will be buying another soon as his brother is almost 10 and will need one too.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer S

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, indestructible!
customer_reviews.text: A little slow at times and some apps don't seem to work, but for a phone under $100 that is virtually indestructible is a great deal. I've ran this thing over, dropped it in a lake and left it in a 150f dry room. Works like a charm. Camera is not very good, but that's not why I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: Well done kyocera
customer_reviews.text: This phone has outlasted all other phones my husband has had. That's saying a lot because he'd break about 1 phone a month! The screen recently cracked, but it took 5 months of rough wear and tear to do it. Very impressed and will be buying the $300 version of this phone next.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleen

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% shatter proof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my fiance because he goes through so many. We needed a phone that would last. It did well for a couple of months but noticed just the other day the it has already has a crack and I have no idea where it came from......
customer_reviews.author: Jackie & Anna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good deal i love this phone its my second one an durable for my line of work

customer_reviews.title: Just don't fam
customer_reviews.text: Pros- This phone is water resistant, the battery life is great. Cons- Camera.. Garbage Screen durability... Garbage It's loads as fast as great granny moves. You want to watch a 4 minute and 20 second David Dobrik video? Better have about 15 minutes. This phone has arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. First one got a virus downloaded a game from an untrustworthy site. These are very good phones and have plenty of memory. Only draw back is the red button on the side gets pushed easily and will sometimes bypass your screen lock and get your phone doing some weird stuff in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: tim l johnson

customer_reviews.title: Was a steal for how great it runs
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a friend and he loves it. Was a steal for how great it runs, and it has a few neat features to it, like the programmable shortcut button, and some cool widgets (it has a compass, among other things). Has a really solid feel and a high waterproof rating
customer_reviews.author: Krondor the Bold

customer_reviews.title: Mil Spec, great phone for technically challenged people.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for technically challenged people who need simplicity. Excellent send/receive power, durability, water resistance. Mil Spec, tough, not pretty. Who cares. It's a communication and survival device not a damn toy.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Unlocked version does not always gives the same app download capability as your service provider
customer_reviews.text: Seller delivered as promised. The phone will not except apps that i had on my old phone witch is the exact phone. The only thing we can figure is its a unlocked phone version. The one i had was AT&T. However its not the sellers fault. They seller followed through on their end. No complaints here with seller. Just understand you may not get the same benefits from a unlocked phone versus a subscribed plan phone from your provider.
customer_reviews.author: Tyken

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again! 😋
customer_reviews.text: My husband had the brigadear on contract and ended up getting off and lost service to the phone. He absolutely loved that phone. But, we found this which is very similar. He puts phones through the wringer. He is very satisfied with this phone. So far so good after three weeks. I have been recommending this phone to everyone. Got it quick and easy set up with at&t!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone. I use it on the Cricket network which does not pose as a problem. There are a few areas that I can count on it lagging in on a regular basis. You will not get nice, clear pictures. However, you can feel the quality and can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Not happy, not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof. Put it in pint glass of water, all ports closed, water damage to the inside phone. Phone crashes and restarts when using Android Auto. Sent it back for a full refund. I recommend the newer duraforce pro.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Crappy camera, lousy SIM card slot, stick with real android powered phones
customer_reviews.text: Crappy camera. SIM card slot didn’t want to take my SIM card after I struggled to get the old SIM card-like piece of plastic out of the slot. Durability is good, but it doesn’t help when the SIM card is stuck inside the phone, causing it to be unusable. Im very disappointed in this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy fortisi

customer_reviews.title: Not unlocked
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my fella. I have never left a negative Amazon review before, I love everything and if I don't then they take it back no problems. However, the issue is that he loves the phone but it is NOT UNLOCKED as clearly advertised. It's an att phone. Pretty pissed.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah W.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this phone.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't even had this piece of crap for a year and the battery is already going and there's no way to replace it. NOW, I have to get another phone because the phone is factory sealed and the battery CANNOT be replaced,. EVER. DON'T BUY THIS PHONE.
customer_reviews.author: Chutney

customer_reviews.title: After a few months the water get in the phone even when in the description say that is a military
customer_reviews.text: Is a great phone but when the phone arrive to my I had an almost invisible spot on the color screen like yellow that you can barely see when you see them somewhere where the background is white, for example on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo carazo Cortés

customer_reviews.title: Not as described.
customer_reviews.text: Was suppose to be unlocked but wasnt. Easy enough to unlock though. Would not work completely on tmobile after I unlocked it. Battery lasted 2 to 3 hours after full charges. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: csr

customer_reviews.title: False advertising! Maybe unlocked, but doesn't work on T-MOBILE
customer_reviews.text: So frustrated! Even though it says unlocked, this an AT&T phone and does NOT work on T-MOBILE despite the claims that it does. Sent it back! Very deceiving
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Elderly phone, but great still!! huge memory, great display, nice to handle
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT ... AND ALREADY BOUGHT THE NEWER MODEL ALSO ;-))
customer_reviews.author: Gary T

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, solid device.
customer_reviews.text: Great second phone, rugged solid device. Loud speaker. Very smooth video. Nice camera. Quality phone. Would love to see and upgrade to Android 6 or 7. But great system nevertheless.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar D Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not the best phone for voice communication.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is hard to hear if not on speaker phone, and if there is any background noise the party you are trying to talk to cannot hear you.
customer_reviews.author: Craig A. Sears

customer_reviews.title: No support?!
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months it stopped working. Evidently all support and return options have closed on this purchase so I guess I'm stuck with a useless phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Dalrymple

customer_reviews.title: 5 out of 5 stars from price to setup. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Just set this up for use in Australia and wow what a great tough phone. Works flawlessly, features make sense and the unit is easy to setup and navigate. This was definately unlocked, worked on the Aus network and is brand new. Recommend this as a great value unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Battery overheated constantly when being charged. I've had 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Battery overheated constantly when being charged. I've had 4 of these phones that worked perfectly. This one from this seller was a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: works great so far
customer_reviews.text: works great so far; not actually sure if it is an "unlocked" phone, because there is a lot of ATT stuff on it, and I am using Red Pocket with an ATT chip; but so far I am very pleased with the phone.
customer_reviews.author: W C.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out of box
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these phones. Out of box one worked and one wouldn't charge. I live in Africa and had this phone brought here by a friend. Now I'm stuck with a useless broken phone.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Bade

customer_reviews.title: Not real confident that the second one is going to hold up much better. When I checked to see if I could ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these phones for my business to use as a technician phone. One phone died this week after only 4 weeks of use. Will not charge and therefore cannot get it to turn on. Not real confident that the second one is going to hold up much better. When I checked to see if I could return or exchange it I found out that the support expired approx.1 month after the purchase. Not impressed that it is only covered for a month. The phone looks brand new and has not been abused in any way.
customer_reviews.author: mittenstatemom

customer_reviews.title: Locked and bloatware
customer_reviews.text: Locked down to AT&T. Full of proprietary AT&T bloatware. Sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Durable phone
customer_reviews.text: Good quality phone. Doesn't work that well on other networks.
customer_reviews.author: mary pinkney

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife who is rough on phones. This one is great and she likes it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: William Stone

customer_reviews.title: More durable than most
customer_reviews.text: Still going on strong. Can't believe how waterproof it actually is. When most phones would stop working this kept on going.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: The phone arrived as described but stopped receiving phone calls ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone arrived as described but stopped receiving phone calls in Feb. The warranty company gave me the run around and now we still have a broken phone.
customer_reviews.author: TA Downing

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement phone for my husband he loves it but the battery is draining rather quickly now but it had taken it a year to actually do so . So it would definitely be a good little replacement phone in the meantime .
customer_reviews.author: A G

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. No booklet. But that's what the internet is for I guess. Great for my kids
customer_reviews.author: hetherr

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone is great! Waterproof feature confirmed. Took some video clips under sea water and it's still doing fine. The speaker is crisp and loud. For phone calls, it's good as well.
customer_reviews.author: oloap

customer_reviews.title: Well built phone. But both phones I purchased the ...
customer_reviews.text: Well built phone. But both phones I purchased the the message wouldn't work properly. Took phone to att and they couldn't figure it out. Called Kyocera customer service and let's say I wasn't impressed. Bought new phones
customer_reviews.author: Sherman Flynn

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: loved it but the screen would get hot to the touch
customer_reviews.author: Sam lambert

customer_reviews.title: Very good basic phone.
customer_reviews.text: Good basic phone. I bought this phone because I keep breaking other more expensive phones. Only two minor complaints. 1. Some apps are not compatible with this phone. 2. Battery does not stay charged all day with medium use unless in eco mode. Very good phone for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: First bad experience with a cell phone but guess I'm willing to try again in time
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I like the rugged it was slow its sticked it locked up battery lasted about 10 minutes and that was it and it took a 12-hour charge each time I tried the best I could to get it to work and couldn't it wouldn't take my cell phone carrier it wouldn't work at all
customer_reviews.author: mike Steele

customer_reviews.title: But all in all i do r recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Loving the durability of this phone. Only one problem..having trouble finding a working music downloader on the play store. But all in all i do r recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This my husbands favorite phone
customer_reviews.text: He dropped his last one exactly this one 23 feet and it held up. He refuses to use any other phone now. Says it's the best phone he has ever had.
customer_reviews.author: CDO

customer_reviews.title: the phone is just as good as phones 10 times it's price
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable value for this phone, aside from the camera, the phone is just as good as phones 10 times it's price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not unlocked. Received a ATT LOCKED phone
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this phone as a backup for my Galaxy S7. I recently needed repairs and move my SIM card to this phone. it doesn't work with T-Mobile or anything but AT&T. very disappointed in Amazon not vetting what they advertise
customer_reviews.author: Michael Amos

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Id buy another if i could afford ...
customer_reviews.text: Compact. Responsive. Hard to kill. Great price. Id buy another if i could afford it. Does work on T-Mobile, but i had to call and get them to give me APN info.
customer_reviews.author: T. Scott Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Great little phone.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it five stars if not for all the apps that can't be removed. Loved this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Audra Huskey

customer_reviews.title: rugged
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great better than my Apple cuz my Apple froze. Up every time it goes below 47 and this keeps on working.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low cost AT&T phone
customer_reviews.text: This is an AT&T phone. I returned because I needed a phone that is actually unlocked.
customer_reviews.author: RobertP

customer_reviews.title: bargain compared to cost of a new phone
customer_reviews.text: my grown son is hard on phone and this is the best one that we have found that holds up to his mistreatment!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Prince

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable
customer_reviews.text: Extremely durable, waterproof. Have really put this phone to the test. It's been run over by a bus ( yes a school bus on a gravel road) and it still works, screen is shattered but still works. Has been wet numerous times
customer_reviews.author: Wesley P.

customer_reviews.title: durable phone
customer_reviews.text: dropped it in the pool. it is water tight and working. the buttons are arranged different than most other brands of phones. just keeps you on your toes using it. thus 4star instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mika

customer_reviews.title: excellent rugged phone and at that price the best
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, great phone, I bought this phone for my father and he loves it along with all the features it has especially that it is rugged, he does a heavy work and his previous phone could not take any more, just excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Fajardo

customer_reviews.title: good phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is too short. Only uses to make/take calls and maybe 1-2 texts per day, the battery life is about 6 hours. We have changed setting to econo battery but it still only lasts the most of 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This phone is just about indestructible
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ran over this phone with my tractor trailer. The glass cracked a little bit but was otherwise fully functional. I only wish it had longer battery life
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible phone. It drops calls regardless of service. The audio quality is awful. The data/internet is trash. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: BrittenyPaige

customer_reviews.title: it feels like it will explode like the samsung
customer_reviews.text: this phone is dangerous. i took it out of the box and turned it on, after around 5 min of running the phone got really hot. there was a burning feeling in my fingers when i was touching the screen. it feels like it will explode like the samsung. stay away from this phone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I've done everything I could to increase power efficiency, but a full charge will only last four or five hours with mild to moderate use.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle mobley

customer_reviews.title: NOT UNLOCKED
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone about 3 days ago, and this device is not unlocked. I bought the 1 day shipping because I needed it as soon as possible for work, now I have to wait an additional 2 days to get this device unlocked, completely waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Dayanna Santana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone, for the price and features it is just awsome.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: love this phone
customer_reviews.text: love this phone. Its a little older, but worth every penny. especially for a back up phone to say the least. Slow phones are a pet peve of mine. This is far from that category. Its 5 times faster than an adroid 7.0 that now serves as a digital paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: cyd C.

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: It's the most handy brick I have ever carried. The only phone I love bought twice. I bought the first one used, it lasted over a year. These things are tough loud and the touchscreen works with gloves on.
customer_reviews.author: I buy bow stuff

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. Latest OS expandable memory works great. Fell out of my pocket and ran over it with my pickup in the gravel cracked the screen but still worked fine bought 2 more for me and my son
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with the phone. The only complaint I have is the charger they sent with it is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Got this phone for my son and he really like this one, He's in his 20's and really rough on phones so this one works for him.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Unlocked???
customer_reviews.text: Phone was not unlocked. Now I have to deal with a return and even longer time with out a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Darrel Elliott

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes but was disappointed that I was unable to activate with T-mobile. Nice durable phone.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper33

product_meta.title: Kyocera DuraForce E6560 16GB Unlocked GSM 4G LTE Military Grade Smartphone w/ 8MP Camera - Black
product_meta.description: The Kyocera DuraForce is IP68 certified and MIL-STD-810G certified. It's powerful, durable, fast,
feature_bullets: THIS PHONE WILL NOT WORK WITH VERIZON NOR SPRINT PHONES
Android v4.4.2 (KitKat), QuadCore 1.4 GHz Processor, Chipset: Qualcomm MSM8928 Snapdragon 4

Internal Memory: 16GB, 2GB RAM microSD Slot Expandable up to 32GB. Make sure the charger/data port, audio jack and card slot covers are properly. seated, with no foreign objects obstructing the seals. Do not spray or immerse your phone in liquids other than fresh water or tap water, such as detergent, beverages, or chlorinated or treated water. Certain liquids such as salt water and chlorinated water are corrosive over time. Should your phone be accidentally exposed to other liquids, rinse the phone gently in clean fresh water. Do not expose your phone to water heated in excess of 104° F (40° C) Your phone is inoperable under water and should be dried as quickly as possible when wet. Do not use the charger/data port for charging, data transmission, etc. until the phone is completely dry. Do not use the headset jack to plug in an accessory until the phone is completely dry. Note: If your phone is unresponsive, press and hold the Power button and both volume buttons down simultaneously for 30 seconds to perform a hard reset (reboot) on your phone.
